reviewText: Nice entry introduction to face painting. Well thought out. Easy Techniques. Great results!

This instructional  DVD is good for learning how to face paint. The teacher Sharon is very thorough in her instruction and takes you from what you need to how to talk to a child about what is going to happen next. Sharon takes you though each animal showing the whole procedure in real time.
I learned a lot watching it.
I enjoy giving reviews, especially for products like this Face Painting DVD. Some of the items I have reviewed are items that my wife has purchased, as we share this Amazon account. You may notice that some are written from my perspective and others are written from hers. We always try the product and give our honest opinion, because just like you we are looking for the truth. We rely on reviews to know which products are excellent quality and worth our precious time and hard earned money. So if a product gets five stars from us, you can rely on it being a quality product that we would purchase again or recommend to family or friends.

I found the two dvd's that I puchased from Amazon were extremely helpful in face painting. The dvd's showed me particular ways in which the art of face painting is done and wish to let any one know that if they were to take up face painting either for a business venture or just a hobby, Amazone would be the company to help with their face painting. I recommend the products that Amazon sell are very affordable and well worth the money.
